symbols.title: class sap.ui.commons.RadioButton
symbols.subTitle: Deprecated in version: 1.38
symbols.deprecatedText: Deprecated as of version 1.38. Instead, use the sap.m.RadioButton control.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.RadioButtonGroup
symbols.description: The RadioButtonGroup is a basic control that is used to provide area for making interactive choice out of a set of options. It represents a list with items where exactly one item can be selected in a session. For the representation of the single group entries, the RadioButton items are created automatically. For the RadioButton choice, mouse and keyboard navigation usage is supported.

properties.name: columns
properties.description: Determines the maximum number of RadioButtons displayed in one line.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Specifies whether the user can change the selected value of the RadioButtonGroup. When the property is set to false, the control obtains visual styles different from its visual styles for the normal and the disabled state. Additionally the control is no longer interactive, but can receive focus.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description:
Enables/disables the RadioButtonGroup. If it is disabled all RadioButtons will be displayed as disabled. The enabled property of the Item will not be used in this case. If the RadioButtonGroup is enabled, the enabled property of the Item will define if a RadioButton is enabled or not.

Since: 1.10.3.

properties.name: selectedIndex
properties.description: The index of the selected/checked RadioButton.

properties.name: valueState
properties.description: The value state to be displayed for the RadioButton. Possible values are: sap.ui.core.ValueState.Error, sap.ui.core.ValueState.Warning, sap.ui.core.ValueState.Success and sap.ui.core.ValueState.None. Note: Setting this attribute to sap.ui.core.ValueState.Error when the accessibility feature is enabled, sets the value of the invalid property for the whole RadioButtonGroup to true.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Defines the width of the RadioButtonGroup.

aggregations.name: items
aggregations.description: The RadioButtons of this RadioButtonGroup.

associations.description: Association to controls / IDs, which describe this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-describedby).

associations.description: Association to controls / IDs, which label this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-labelledby).

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.RangeSlider
symbols.description: The interactive control is displayed either as a horizontal or a vertical line with two pointers and units of measurement. Users can move the pointers along the line to change a range with graphical support.

properties.description:
Current second value of the slider. (Position of the second grip.)

Note: If the value is not in the valid range (between min and max) it will be changed to be in the valid range. If it is smaller than value it will be set to the same value.

Note: If the value is not in the valid range (between min and max) it will be changed to be in the valid range. If it is smaller than value it will be set to the same value.

Default value is 80.

Default value is 80.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.RatingIndicator
symbols.description: RatingIndicator is used to let the user do some rating on a given topic. The amount of rating symbols can be specified, as well as the URIs to the image icons which shall be used as rating symbols. When the user performs a rating, an event is fired.

properties.name: averageValue
properties.description: Determines the average value. This value is shown if no value is set. This can be used to display an average Value before the user votes.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Determines if the rating symbols can be edited.

properties.name: iconHovered
properties.description: The URI to the image which is displayed when the mouse hovers onto a rating symbol. If used, a requirement is that all custom icons need to have the same size. Note that when this attribute is used also the other icon attributes need to be set.

properties.name: iconSelected
properties.description: The URI to the image which shall be displayed for all selected rating symbols. Note that when this attribute is used, also the other icon attributes need to be set.

properties.name: iconUnselected
properties.description: The URI to the image which shall be displayed for all unselected rating symbols. If this attribute is used, a requirement is that all custom icons need to have the same size. Note that when this attribute is used also the other icon attributes need to be set.

properties.name: maxValue
properties.description: Determines the number of displayed rating symbols

properties.name: value
properties.description: Determines the currently selected value. If value is set to sap.ui.commons.RatingIndicator.NoValue, the averageValue is shown.

properties.name: visualMode
properties.description: Defines how float values are visualized: Full, Half, Continuous (see enumeration RatingIndicatorVisualMode)

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.RatingIndicatorVisualMode
symbols.description:
Possible values for the visualization of float values in the RatingIndicator Control.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/commons/library' module export and must be accessed by the property 'RatingIndicatorVisualMode'.

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.RatingIndicatorVisualMode.Continuous
properties.description: Values are not rounded.

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.RatingIndicatorVisualMode.Full
properties.description: Values are rounded to the nearest integer value (e.g. 1.7 -> 2).

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.RatingIndicatorVisualMode.Half
properties.description: Values are rounded to the nearest half value (e.g. 1.7 -> 1.5).

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.ResponsiveContainer
symbols.description: Is used to provide a container, which can show different content depending on its current width. It fires an event, whenever a new range is reached. In addition the content of the new range is automatically shown, if it is set.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The width of the responsive container.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the responsive container.

aggregations.description: The currently shown content, either the default content or content of a range

aggregations.name: ranges
aggregations.description: The ranges defined for this container

associations.name: defaultContent
associations.description: The default content to show, in case the range does not provide content

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.RowRepeater
symbols.description: This control displays items in a stacked list format, allowing the user to page in order to see more items or to use the offered filtering and sorting capabilities in order to manipulate the displayed data.

properties.name: currentPage
properties.description: The index of the page currently displayed. The index starts at 1.

properties.name: design
properties.description: The visual design of the control.

properties.name: fixedRowHeight
properties.description: Row height adapts to rendered content. If a fixed height is specified the cells have a maximum height and the overflow will be hidden.

properties.name: numberOfRows
properties.description: Number of rows displayed.

properties.name: showMoreSteps
properties.description: Step size used to increase the numberOfRows value. This feature is only active if value is greater than 0. This will deactivate the paging feature.

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Threshold to fetch the next chunk of data. The minimal threshold can be the numberOfRows of the RR.

aggregations.name: filterToolbar
aggregations.description: A Toolbar which used internally by the RowRepeater

aggregations.name: filters
aggregations.description: Filters to be provided in toolbar.

aggregations.name: footerPager
aggregations.description: A Paginator which used internally by the RowRepeater

aggregations.name: footerShowMoreButton
aggregations.description: A Button which used internally by the RowRepeater

aggregations.name: headerShowMoreButton
aggregations.description: A Button which used internally by the RowRepeater

aggregations.name: noData
aggregations.description: This control is shown, in case there is no data available to be displayed in the RowRepeater.

aggregations.name: rows
aggregations.description: Rows to be repeated.

aggregations.name: sorterToolbar
aggregations.description: A Toolbar which used internally by the RowRepeater

aggregations.name: sorters
aggregations.description: Sorters to be provided in secondary toolbar.

aggregations.name: title
aggregations.description: Title to be displayed in top left corner. Either text or icon.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.RowRepeaterDesign
symbols.description:
Determines the visual design of a RowRepeater.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/commons/library' module export and must be accessed by the property 'RowRepeaterDesign'.

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.RowRepeaterDesign.BareShell
properties.description: The RowRepeater will be displayed without header, toolbar or footer. Background will be transparent.

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.RowRepeaterDesign.Standard
properties.description: The RowRepeater header and footer elements, as well as the row container background, appear solid.

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.RowRepeaterDesign.Transparent
properties.description: The RowRepeater header and footer elements, as well as the row container background, appear transparent.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.SearchField
symbols.description: Allows the user to type search queries and to trigger the search. Optionally, suggestions can be added.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Non-editable controls have different colors, depending on custom settings

properties.name: enableCache
properties.description:
When list suggestion is enabled all suggestions are cached and no suggest event is fired.

Since: 1.10.3.

properties.name: enableClear
properties.description: Defines whether the clear functionality shall be active

properties.name: enableFilterMode
properties.description: Defines whether the search event should also be fired when the SearchField is empty (like a Filter field) and when the clear button (if activated) is pressed.

properties.name: enableListSuggest
properties.description: Defines whether a pop up list shall be provided for suggestions

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Disabled fields have different colors, and they can not be focused.

properties.name: maxHistoryItems
properties.description: Maximum number of history items in the suggestion list. 0 displays and stores no history. The history is locally stored on the client. Therefore do not activate this feature when this control handles confidential data.

properties.name: maxLength
properties.description: Maximum number of characters. Value '0' means the feature is switched off.

properties.name: maxSuggestionItems
properties.description: Maximum number of suggestion items in the suggestion list.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description:
Placeholder for the input field.

Since: 1.32.

properties.name: showExternalButton
properties.description: Defines whether an additional search button shall be displayed

properties.name: showListExpander
properties.description: Defines whether the list expander shall be displayed in the case of an enabled list for suggestions. This feature is deactivated on mobile devices.

properties.name: startSuggestion
properties.description: Minimum length of the entered string triggering the suggestion list.

properties.name: textAlign
properties.description: Sets the horizontal alignment of the text

properties.name: value
properties.description: Text that shall be displayed within the search field

properties.name: valueState
properties.description:
Visualizes warnings or errors related to the input field. Possible values: Warning, Error, Success, None.

Since: 1.32.

properties.name: visibleItemCount
properties.description: Defines the number of items in the suggestion list that shall be displayed at once. If the overall number of list items is higher than the setting, a scroll bar is provided.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Control width in CSS-size

aggregations.name: searchProvider
aggregations.description: Search provider instance which handles the suggestions for this SearchField (e.g. Open Search Protocol).

associations.name: ariaDescribedBy
associations.description: Association to controls / IDs which describe this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-describedby).

associations.name: ariaLabelledBy
associations.description: Association to controls / IDs which label this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-labelledby).

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.SearchProvider
symbols.description: A SearchProvider which can be attached to a Search Field.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new SearchProvider.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

This class does not have its own settings, but all settings applicable to the base type sap.ui.core.search.OpenSearchProvider can be used.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.search.OpenSearchProvider.extend.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.Slider
symbols.description: The interactive control is displayed either as a horizontal or a vertical line with a pointer and units of measurement. Users can move the pointer along the line to change values with graphical support.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Using the slider interactively requires value "true".

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Switches enabled state of the control. Disabled fields have different colors, and can not be focused.

properties.name: height
properties.description:
Height of the vertical slider.

Since: 1.7.1.

properties.name: labels
properties.description:
Labels to be displayed instead of numbers. Attribute totalUnits and label count should be the same

Note: To show the labels stepLabels must be activated.

properties.name: max
properties.description:
Maximal value of the slider

Note: If min is larger than max both values will be switched

properties.name: min
properties.description:
Minimal value of the slider.

Note: If min is larger than max both values will be switched

properties.name: smallStepWidth
properties.description: The grip can only be moved in steps of this width.

properties.name: stepLabels
properties.description: Display step numbers for the ticks on the slider.

properties.name: totalUnits
properties.description: Number of units that are displayed by ticks. The PageUp and PageDown keys navigate according to these units.

properties.name: value
properties.description:
Current value of the slider. (Position of the grip.)

Note: If the value is not in the valid range (between min and max) it will be changed to be in the valid range.

properties.name: vertical
properties.description:
Orientation of slider

Since: 1.7.1.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the horizontal slider.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.Splitter
symbols.description: Allows to split the screen into two areas. Make sure that the container for the splitter has an absolute height or set an absolute height for the splitter using the height property. Otherwise the height of the splitter is calculated by the height of its contents.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the split area in px or in %

properties.name: minSizeFirstPane
properties.description: The minimum size (width for vertical splitter or height for horizontal splitter) of the first Pane

properties.name: minSizeSecondPane
properties.description: The minimum size (width for vertical splitter or height for horizontal splitter) of the second Pane

properties.name: showScrollBars
properties.description: Specifies if the browser should display scroll bars or simply cut the content of a splitter pane when the content does not fit into its pane.

properties.name: splitterBarVisible
properties.description: set the splitter bar to be visible or not.

properties.name: splitterOrientation
properties.description: The splitter can have horizontal or vertical orientation.

properties.name: splitterPosition
properties.description: Position of splitter bar in percentage. The default value means that the splitter is positioned in the middle of the area that is available for the splitter.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the split area in px or in %

aggregations.name: firstPaneContent
aggregations.description: Controls inside the first pane. These are the left ones in case of defining a vertical splitter, and the top ones in case of using the horizontal splitter.

aggregations.name: secondPaneContent
aggregations.description: Controls inside the second pane. These are the right ones in case of defining a vertical splitter, and the bottom ones in case of using the horizontal splitter.

parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.TabStrip
symbols.description: TabStrip represents a container for tab controls, which contain the content and generally other controls. The user switches between the tabs to display the content.

properties.name: enableTabReordering
properties.description: Specifies whether tab reordering is enabled.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Specifies the height of the tab bar and content area.

properties.name: selectedIndex
properties.description: Specifies the index of the currently selected tab.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Specifies the width of the bar and content area.

aggregations.description: The right arrow, used for tab scrolling.

aggregations.description: The tabs contained in the TabStrip.

Fires when the user selects a tab.

methods.name: closeTab

parameters.name: iIndex
parameters.description: The index of the tab that should be closed

methods.description:
Closes a tab (if the tab is selected, the next one will be selected; if it's the last tab, the previous one will be selected).

This method should be called if the close event is fired. It can not be called automatically because the consumer might need to run some logic before the tab is closed.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.TextField
symbols.description: Renders an input field for text input.

properties.name: accessibleRole
properties.description: Accessibility role for the text field.

properties.name: design
properties.description: Font type. valid values are Standard and Monospace.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Switches edit state of the control. Read-only fields have different colors, depending on theme setting.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Switches enabled state of the control. Disabled fields have different colors, and can not be focused.

properties.name: helpId
properties.description: Unique identifier used for help service.

properties.name: imeMode
properties.description: State of the Input Method Editor (IME).

properties.name: maxLength
properties.description: Maximum number of characters. Value '0' means the feature is switched off.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name property to be used in the HTML code (e.g. for HTML forms that send data to the server via 'submit').

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description:
Placeholder for the text field.

Since: 1.14.0.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Depending on theme the TextField is shown as required. If a Label is assigned to the TextField it will visualize the requires state too.

properties.name: textAlign
properties.description: Sets the horizontal alignment of the text.

properties.name: textDirection
properties.description: Direction of the text. Possible values: "rtl", "ltr".

properties.name: value
properties.description: Text inside the TextField

properties.name: valueState
properties.description: Visualizes warnings or errors related to the text field. Possible values: Warning, Error, Success.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of text field. When it is set (CSS-size such as % or px), this is the exact size. When left blank, the text field length defines the width.

associations.name: ariaDescribedBy
associations.description: Association to controls / IDs which describe this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-describedby).

associations.name: ariaLabelledBy
associations.description: Association to controls / IDs which label this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-labelledby).

parameters.name: sID
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no ID is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new TextField.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.name: change

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: The new / changed value of the TextField.

events.description: Event is fired when the text in the field has changed AND the focus leaves the TextField or the Enter key is pressed.

events.name: liveChange

parameters.name: liveValue
parameters.description: Current visible value of the TextField.

events.description: This event if fired during typing into the TextField and returns the currently entered value. Note: This is not the content of the value property. The value property is only updated by ENTER and by leaving the control.

methods.name: _checkChange

parameters.name: oEvent
parameters.description: The event object.

methods.description: Compares the previous value with the current value and fires the change event if the TextField is editable and the value has changed.

methods.name: addAriaDescribedBy

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: vAriaDescribedBy
parameters.description: The ariaDescribedBy to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some ariaDescribedBy into the association ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: addAriaLabelledBy

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: vAriaLabelledBy
parameters.description: The ariaLabelledBy to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some ariaLabelledBy into the association ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: attachChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.commons.TextField itself

methods.description:
Attaches event handler fnFunction to the change event of this sap.ui.commons.TextField.

When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.commons.TextField itself.

Event is fired when the text in the field has changed AND the focus leaves the TextField or the Enter key is pressed.

methods.name: attachLiveChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.commons.TextField itself

methods.description:
Attaches event handler fnFunction to the liveChange event of this sap.ui.commons.TextField.

When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.commons.TextField itself.

This event if fired during typing into the TextField and returns the currently entered value. Note: This is not the content of the value property. The value property is only updated by ENTER and by leaving the control.

The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarDesign
symbols.description:
Determines the visual design of a Toolbar.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/commons/library' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ToolbarDesign'.

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarDesign.Flat
properties.description: The included controls have a very light appearance. The feature might be not supported by all themes.

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarDesign.Standard
properties.description: The toolbar elements such as buttons for example have their normal visual design, and the toolbar appears solid. The feature might be not supported by all themes.

properties.name: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarDesign.Transparent
properties.description: The controls included in the toolbar have a normal visual design where the toolbar appears transparent. The feature might be not supported by all themes.

symbols.title: enum sap.ui.commons.ToolbarDesign
symbols.subTitle: Deprecated in version: 1.38
symbols.deprecatedText: Deprecated as of version 1.38

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarItem
symbols.description:
Marker interface for common controls which are suitable for use within a toolbar. The most prominent example of a toolbar item is a button which is mostly used with an icon instead of a text caption.

Toolbar items must have a fixed height compatible with the toolbar being a single horizontal row. They can refer to the toolbar's marker class "sapUiTb" to adjust their own theming when used inside a toolbar.
symbols.title: interface sap.ui.commons.ToolbarItem

symbols.deprecatedText: Deprecated as of version 1.38. (altogether with sap.ui.commons.Toolbar). Use sap.m.Toolbar instead.

symbols.name: sap.ui.commons.TriStateCheckBox
symbols.description: TriStateCheckBox to reflect mixed state for checkboxes. The control can display three states, namely checked, unchecked and mixed. However, mixed state cannot be directly reached by user interaction on the particular control. It can be only set by the control's public toggle function, to make a behaviour possible which is e.g. required in checkbox trees.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Specifies whether the user shall be allowed to flag the check box

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Using this property, the control could be disabled, if required.

properties.name: selectionState
properties.description: Defines the states of the checkbox

properties.name: text
properties.description: Defines the text displayed next to the check box

properties.name: textDirection
properties.description: The value can be set to LTR or RTL. Otherwise, the control inherits the text direction from its parent control.

properties.name: valueState
properties.description: Accepts the core enumeration ValueState.type that supports 'None', 'Error', 'Warning' and 'Success'.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width can be set to an absolute value. If no value is set, the control width results from the text length.
